question: How Do I Change My Mailing Preferences to Paperless in my Virginia's Insurance Marketplace?
text:
How Do I Change My Mailing Preferences to Paperless in my Virginia's Insurance Marketplace?
          
        

To change your mailing preferences, login to Virginia's Insurance Marketplace website at:
https://enroll.marketplace.virginia.gov


To change your mailing preferences, login to Virginia's Insurance Marketplace website at:


As a person in the application:
In the Primary Contact Information tab, scroll down until you reach the Primary Contact Preferences.

Update the Preferred Method Communication and/or the 1095-A form section(s) but selecting the radio button. Finish by pressing the Save and Continue button.
